thread.title: Attend Cobb Apparel Show and Stay at Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Galleria
thread.title_full: Attend Cobb Apparel Show and Stay at Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Galleria - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Attend Cobb Apparel Show and Stay at Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Galleria
text:
Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Galleria, located near Smyrna, Georgia, offers convenient lodging for The Cobb Show at Cobb Galleria Centre on October 18-19, 2015.
 ATLANTA, GA, October 08, Buyers and exhibitors attending The Cobb Show on October 18-19 will find convenient lodging at the Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Galleria Hotel . The event will be held at the Cobb Galleria Centre. The Cobb Show is the largest men's apparel trade show in the Southeast, featuring more than 600 brands. Styles represented will include premium, progressive, dress wear, junior, and urban lines.
"We are pleased to welcome guests attending The Cobb Show," shares James Dennis, Director of Sales at the Hampton Inn and Suites Atlanta Galleria. "Our hotel is conveniently located two minutes away from the Cobb Galleria Centre," explains Dennis.
The award winning Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Galleria features well appointed non-smoking rooms with microwave, mini refrigerator, and free high speed Internet. Guests will rest in comfort on Hampton Clean and Fresh beds. Hampton's complimentary On the House Breakfast, with hot waffle station, is a delicious way to start the day. On the Run Breakfast Bags are a quick option on weekday mornings. Guests can enjoy a freshly baked cookie at check in, and then relax at the hotel's indoor pool or fitness center. Other property amenities include a 24-hour business center and Pavilion Pantry Market for snacks and beverages. Free weekday shuttle service is available to nearby locations including Cobb Galleria Centre. This Cobb Galleria hotel received the 2015 TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence Award for superior service.
Current lodging specials include the Weekend Getaway Package and the Book Early & Save deal. AAA, senior, and military discounts are available. HHonors members can earn double points when booking the 2X Points Package. The Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Galleria is located near the intersection of I-75 and I-285.
For information about The Cobb Show, visit www.thecobbshow.com . To book your stay at the Hampton Inn & Suites Smyrna GA hotel , call (770) 955-1110 or visit their website at www.HAMPTONINNGALLERIA.com .
About Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta-Galleria
If you're looking for a great hotel in Atlanta, be a guest at the Hampton Inn & Suites hotel in Atlanta Galleria. It's super-convenient, located within walking distance of the Cobb Galleria Convention Center (which you may be visiting for business in Atlanta). This Atlanta area hotel is also just 12 miles from the Georgia Aquarium, Georgia World Congress Center, Six Flags Over Georgia and the Georgia Dome. The Smyrna, Georgia hotel also offers a broad range of services and amenities to make its guests' stay exceptional.
For more information visit: http://www.HamptonInnGalleria.com
For all media inquiries, please contact:
Allison Reinert
Cardinal Web Solutions
